backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two bugs to fix: restoring the cases list display broken in version 78 (filtering.ts) and fixing the broken app logo in the navigation header (App.tsx).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, and utility in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing favicon assets, web manifest, Apple touch icon meta tags, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon references for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and cache cleanup on activation; skips caching for API calls and Internet Identity flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing the authenticated app shell with sticky navigation header, view routing (dashboard/cases/settings), new case dialog, and login/logout flow using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component that uses Internet Identity for authentication and clears the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name and saves their profile using the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation, blocking dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) for surgery cases and exports utility functions to compute remaining, completed, and total task counts along with Tailwind color helpers.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Renders a collapsible card for a surgery case showing species icon, patient info, and an interactive checklist where tasks can be toggled complete via the `useUpdateTask` mutation.
A dialog form for creating new surgery cases with fields for patient details, a quick-fill text area with speech recognition support, debounced previous-case search, and a checklist editor.
Displays a filterable, searchable, and sortable grid of surgery case cards with controls for species, task type, completion status, sort order, and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button that filters cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined `SORT_OPTIONS`.
A popover filter component that allows multi-select filtering of cases by species, persisting the selection to session storage.

A popover filter component that lets users filter cases by task types using checkboxes, persisting selections to sessionStorage. Displays a badge with the count of active filters and supports a 'show all tasks completed' toggle.

A checklist editor component that renders task checkboxes in either 'creation' mode (toggling selected fields) or 'completion' mode (toggling completed fields), showing only selected tasks in completion mode.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, progress tracking, and creating or updating cases via backend mutations with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, auto-advancing to the next field on complete input.
Provides exportCasesToCsv and importCasesFromCsv functions for serializing surgery cases to CSV and parsing CSV files back into case data, including validation and matching against existing cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript types, valid enum values, and format constants for dates and booleans.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides functions to filter surgery cases by species, by incomplete task types, by all-tasks-completed status, and to exclude fully completed cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: React hook that wraps the browser Web Speech API to provide speech-to-text recording with state for transcript, recording status, errors, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object, mapping recognized field labels to typed values including species, sex, dates, and string fields.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a landscape HTML table report of surgery cases with remaining tasks, using a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a timestamped CSV file of surgery cases including remaining checklist tasks, using a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Utility functions for formatting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values into human-readable strings for PDF display, plus text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Utility functions for formatting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values into human-readable strings for CSV report output.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters an array of SurgeryCase objects by a search query, matching against basic case fields and selected-but-incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for an AI image analysis service.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or open task count.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constants for species and sex dropdown options, and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and utility functions for date parsing, formatting, and conversion between Date objects and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Renders the main dashboard with a filterable, searchable, sortable grid of CaseCard components, including species/task filters and PDF export functionality.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Provides utilities to extract open task items from individual cases and calculate the total open task count across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Renders a settings page where users can configure and save an OpenAI API key, with status indicators showing whether AI analysis is currently enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced result.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Computer authentication via AuthClient, exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, including fetching all cases, fetching by MRN, creating, and updating cases via an ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a light blue theme, with dark mode forced to match light mode.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file providing full type definitions for the tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker, RecognizeResult, PSM, and OEM enums.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and font family, and registers animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw tracking two Version 78 regressions: cases list showing 'No cases found' and a broken app logo in the navigation header.
